trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to measure and render text.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos utilizados para medir e compor texto.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The TextRenderer class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used for measuring and drawing text on a Windows Form control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de TextRenderer fornece um conjunto de `static` métodos que podem ser utilizados para medir e desenhar o texto um controlo de formulário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the TextRenderer is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido da TextRenderer é adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador de texto desenhado para acomodar overhanging glyphs.

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods of TextRenderer are not supported for printing.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos de TextRenderer não são suportados para impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should always use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Deve sempre utilizar os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text at the specified location using the specified device context, font, and color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado na localização especificada com o contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra e cores.

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `font` is `null` or `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the DrawText method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font` é `null` ou `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, o método DrawText vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>como o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado não são apresentadas corretamente no Windows 2000.</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> for the bounds of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: Se a sua aplicação destina-se em máquinas com o Windows 2000, deve utilizar um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>para os limites do texto desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text within the specified bounds, using the specified device context, font, and color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado dentro dos limites especificados, com o contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra e cores.

trans-unit.source: If `font` or `forecolor` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font` ou `forecolor` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will result in text that is horizontally and vertically centered in the rectangle specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método irá resultar no texto horizontal e verticalmente centra-se no retângulo especificado pelo `bounds` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: To change how the text is drawn, use a version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter type.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a forma como o texto é desenhado, utilize uma versão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>tipo de parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text at the specified location, using the specified device context, font, color, and back color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado na localização especificada, utilizando o contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra, cor e cor de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The `backColor` parameter is applied to the rectangular area containing the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O `backColor` parâmetro é aplicado para a área retangular que contém o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: If `font`, `backcolor` or `forecolor` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font`, `backcolor` ou `forecolor` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>como o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado não são apresentadas corretamente no Windows 2000.</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> for the bounds of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: Se a sua aplicação destina-se em máquinas com o Windows 2000, deve utilizar um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>para os limites do texto desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the background area of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar a área de em segundo plano do texto desenhada.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text at the specified location using the specified device context, font, color, and formatting instructions.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado na localização especificada utilizando o contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra, cor e instruções de formatação.

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador do texto para acomodar overhanging glyphs desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: The `backColor` parameter is applied to the area within the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O `backColor` parâmetro é aplicado para a área de dentro de `bounds` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If `font` or `forecolor` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font` ou `forecolor` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> flag.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>does não suporte a adição deixa de separador desenhada texto, embora pode expandir separador existente deixa de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>sinalizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>como o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado não são apresentadas corretamente no Windows 2000.</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> for the bounds of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: Se a sua aplicação destina-se em máquinas com o Windows 2000, deve utilizar um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>para os limites do texto desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text within the specified bounds using the specified device context, font, color, and back color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado dentro dos limites especificados com o contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra, cor e cor de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The `backColor` parameter is applied to the area within the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O `backColor` parâmetro é aplicado para a área de dentro de `bounds` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If `font`, `backcolor` or `forecolor` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font`, `backcolor` ou `forecolor` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will result in text that is horizontally and vertically centered in the rectangle specified by the `bounds` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método irá resultar no texto horizontal e verticalmente centra-se no retângulo especificado pelo `bounds` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: To change how the text is drawn, use a version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter type.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a forma como o texto é desenhado, utilize uma versão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>tipo de parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the area represented by `bounds`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar a área de representado pelo `bounds`.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text within the specified bounds using the specified device context, font, color, and formatting instructions.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado dentro dos limites especificados utilizando o contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra, cor e instruções de formatação.

trans-unit.source: If `font` or `color` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font` ou `color` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the DrawText overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando uma das sobrecargas DrawText que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador do texto para acomodar overhanging glyphs desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> flag.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>does não suporte a adição deixa de separador desenhada texto, embora pode expandir separador existente deixa de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>sinalizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do texto.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text at the specified location using the specified device context, font, color, back color, and formatting instructions
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado na localização especificada utilizando o contexto de dispositivo especificado tipo de letra, cor, a cor de fundo e instruções de formatação

trans-unit.source: The `backcolor` parameter is applied the rectangular area containing the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O `backcolor` parâmetro é aplicado a área retangular que contém o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: If `font` or `forecolor` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: Se `font` ou `forecolor` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador do texto para acomodar overhanging glyphs desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: The text rendering offered by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: A composição de texto oferecidas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>classe está baseada numa composição de texto GDI e não é suportada para impressão do Windows Forms.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, utilize os <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> flag.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>does não suporte a adição deixa de separador desenhada texto, embora pode expandir separador existente deixa de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>sinalizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Point>como o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado não são apresentadas corretamente no Windows 2000.</xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> methods that specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> for the bounds of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: Se a sua aplicação destina-se em máquinas com o Windows 2000, deve utilizar um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>métodos que especificam um <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>para os limites do texto desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o canto superior esquerdo do texto desenhado.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to apply to the background area of the drawn text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> para aplicar a área de em segundo plano do texto desenhada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Draws the specified text within the specified bounds using the specified device context, font, color, back color, and formatting instructions.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto especificado dentro dos limites especificados utilizando o contexto de dispositivo especificado tipo de letra, cor, a cor de fundo e instruções de formatação.

trans-unit.source: The `backcolor` parameter is applied to the area within the `bounds` parameter`.` If `font`, `forecolor` or `backcolor` is `null` or <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, respectively; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`.
trans-unit.target: O `backcolor` parâmetro é aplicado para a área de dentro de `bounds` parâmetro`.` se `font`, `forecolor` ou `backcolor` é `null` ou <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>, respetivamente; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>método vai desenhar o texto no tipo de letra ou cor atualmente selecionada no contexto de dispositivo especificado pelo `dc`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>

trans-unit.source: If `forecolor` is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, the text will not be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Se `forecolor` é <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>, o texto não irá ser desenhado.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador do texto para acomodar overhanging glyphs desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> flag.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>does não suporte a adição deixa de separador desenhada texto, embora pode expandir separador existente deixa de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>sinalizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Provides the size, in pixels, of the specified text when drawn with the specified font.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o tamanho, em pixels, do texto especificado quando desenhado com o tipo de letra especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> method requires that the text is drawn on a single line.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>método requer que o texto é desenhado numa única linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to measure.
trans-unit.target: O texto a medir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the measured text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar a medida em texto.

trans-unit.source: The , in pixels, of text drawn on a single line with the specified font.
trans-unit.target: O , em pixels, de text desenhada numa linha única com especificado font .

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText*> overloads that takes a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> parameter. For example, the default behavior of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"></xref> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText*> that take a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <> </> *> sobrecargas que assume um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> parâmetro. Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer"> </xref> consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador de texto desenhado para acomodar overhanging glyphs. Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <> </> *> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText*>que demoram um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText*>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.

trans-unit.source: Provides the size, in pixels, of the specified text drawn with the specified font in the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o tamanho, em pixels, do texto especificado desenhadas com o tipo de letra especificado no contexto de dispositivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The MeasureText method requires that the text is drawn on a single line.
trans-unit.target: O método de MeasureText requer que o texto é desenhado numa única linha.

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to measure the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual medir o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to measure.
trans-unit.target: O texto a medir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the measured text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar a medida em texto.

trans-unit.source: The , in pixels, of text drawn in a single line with the specified font in the specified device context.
trans-unit.target: O , em pixels, de text desenhada numa linha única com especificado font no contexto de dispositivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Provides the size, in pixels, of the specified text when drawn with the specified font, using the specified size to create an initial bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o tamanho, em pixels, do texto especificado quando desenhado com o tipo de letra especificado, utilizando o tamanho especificado para criar um retângulo delimitador inicial.

trans-unit.source: The MeasureText method uses the `proposedSize` parameter to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size.
trans-unit.target: O método MeasureText utiliza o `proposedSize` parâmetro para indicar a relação da altura para largura ao determinar o tamanho do texto.

trans-unit.source: When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a height dimension greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.Size> will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text.
trans-unit.target: Ao medir texto numa única linha, se o `proposedSize` parâmetro representa um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>com uma dimensão de altura superior <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, o devolvido <xref:System.Drawing.Size>será ajustada para refletir a altura real do texto.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The text to measure.
trans-unit.target: O texto a medir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the measured text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar a medida em texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the initial bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do retângulo delimitador inicial.

trans-unit.source: The , in pixels, of text drawn with the specified font.
trans-unit.target: O , em pixels, de text desenhadas especificado com font .

trans-unit.source: Provides the size, in pixels, of the specified text when drawn with the specified font in the specified device context, using the specified size to create an initial bounding rectangle for the text.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o tamanho, em pixels, do texto especificado quando desenhado com o tipo de letra especificado no contexto de dispositivo especificado, utilizando o tamanho especificado para criar um retângulo delimitador inicial para o texto.

trans-unit.source: The MeasureText method uses the `proposedSize` parameter to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size.
trans-unit.target: O método MeasureText utiliza o `proposedSize` parâmetro para indicar a relação da altura para largura ao determinar o tamanho do texto.

trans-unit.source: When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a height dimension greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.Size> will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text.
trans-unit.target: Ao medir texto numa única linha, se o `proposedSize` parâmetro representa um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>com uma dimensão de altura superior <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, o devolvido <xref:System.Drawing.Size>será ajustada para refletir a altura real do texto.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The device context in which to measure the text.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de dispositivo no qual medir o texto.

trans-unit.source: The text to measure.
trans-unit.target: O texto a medir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the measured text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar a medida em texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the initial bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do retângulo delimitador inicial.

trans-unit.source: The , in pixels, of text drawn with the specified font.
trans-unit.target: O , em pixels, de text desenhadas especificado com font .

trans-unit.source: dc is .
trans-unit.target: dcis .

trans-unit.source: Provides the size, in pixels, of the specified text when drawn with the specified font and formatting instructions, using the specified size to create the initial bounding rectangle for the text.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o tamanho, em pixels, do texto especificado quando desenhado com o tipo de letra especificado e instruções de formatação, utilizando o tamanho especificado para criar o retângulo delimitador inicial para o texto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> uses the `proposedSize` and `flags` parameters to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>utiliza o `proposedSize` e `flags` parâmetros para indicar a relação da altura para largura ao determinar o tamanho do texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>

trans-unit.source: When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a height dimension greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.Size> will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text.
trans-unit.target: Ao medir texto numa única linha, se o `proposedSize` parâmetro representa um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>com uma dimensão de altura superior <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, o devolvido <xref:System.Drawing.Size>será ajustada para refletir a altura real do texto.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador do texto para acomodar overhanging glyphs desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais deve utilizar as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This overload of MeasureText will ignore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta sobrecarga de MeasureText ignorará um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: If you are specifying a padding value other than the default, you should use the overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29> that takes a <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Se especificar um valor de preenchimento diferente da predefinição, deve utilizar a sobrecarga do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>que assume um <xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext>objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.IDeviceContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%28System.Drawing.IDeviceContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Size%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>

trans-unit.source: The text to measure.
trans-unit.target: O texto a medir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the measured text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar a medida em texto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the initial bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do retângulo delimitador inicial.

trans-unit.source: The formatting instructions to apply to the measured text.
trans-unit.target: As instruções de formatação a aplicar a medida em texto.

trans-unit.source: The , in pixels, of text drawn with the specified font and format.
trans-unit.target: O , em pixels, de text desenhadas especificado com font e o formato.

trans-unit.source: Provides the size, in pixels, of the specified text when drawn with the specified device context, font, and formatting instructions, using the specified size to create the initial bounding rectangle for the text.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o tamanho, em pixels, do texto especificado quando desenhada no contexto de dispositivo especificado, tipo de letra e instruções de formatação, utilizando o tamanho especificado para criar o retângulo delimitador inicial para o texto.

trans-unit.source: The MeasureText method uses the `proposedSize` and `flags` parameters to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size.
trans-unit.target: O método MeasureText utiliza o `proposedSize` e `flags` parâmetros para indicar a relação da altura para largura ao determinar o tamanho do texto.

trans-unit.source: When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> with a height dimension greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, the returned <xref:System.Drawing.Size> will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text.
trans-unit.target: Ao medir texto numa única linha, se o `proposedSize` parâmetro representa um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>com uma dimensão de altura superior <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>, o devolvido <xref:System.Drawing.Size>será ajustada para refletir a altura real do texto.</xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> overloads that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Pode manipular a forma como o texto é desenhado utilizando um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>sobrecargas que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>consiste em Adicionar preenchimento para o retângulo delimitador do texto para acomodar overhanging glyphs desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>

trans-unit.source: If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces, use the versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> that take a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> parameter, as shown in the example.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de desenhar uma linha de texto sem estes espaços adicionais, utilize as versões do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A>que demoram um <xref:System.Drawing.Size>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>parâmetro, conforme mostrado no exemplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.MeasureText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer.DrawText%2A>
